rows.label: qst300102_msg001
rows.name:
Oh, you're here. I'll
explain right away.

rows.label: qst300102_msg002
rows.name:
What's needed for the Merc
Group's missions...[ML:Dash ] is
rations for expeditions!

rows.label: qst300102_msg003
rows.name:
We can't guarantee we'll find food at
our destination, so we have to secure
our own supply to bring with us.

rows.label: qst300102_msg004
rows.name:
Until now, Vandham-san took
care of procuring and
managing all the rations.

rows.label: qst300102_msg005
rows.name:
Now that he's gone, we have to
do it ourselves, and we're
fumbling our way through it...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300102_msg006
rows.name:
We just can't seem to
find a good method.

rows.label: qst300102_msg007
rows.name:
While we've been worrying
about it, the food in the
warehouse has been dwindling.

rows.label: qst300102_msg008
rows.name:
Before our current rations run
out, we need to stock up on more.

rows.label: qst300102_msg009
rows.name:
So, I'd like to entrust the
gathering of ingredients and
the making of rations to you.

rows.label: qst300102_msg010
rows.name: What do you say? Will you do it?

rows.label: qst300102_msg011
rows.name:
All right! Then I'll make
arrangements so you can use the
pot at the Plaza of Reprieve.

rows.label: qst300102_msg012
rows.name:
Once you've gathered the ingredients,
you can make the rations there.

rows.label: qst300102_msg013
rows.name:
You can use any ingredients
you like, as long as they
can be preserved.

rows.label: qst300102_msg014
rows.name: I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst300102_msg101
rows.name:
Once you've gathered the ingredients,
use the pot at the Plaza of Reprieve
to make the rations.

rows.label: qst300102_msg102
rows.name: Have you been to Sadecott Groceries?

rows.label: qst300102_msg103
rows.name:
Memera at the shop was looking
for you. Go and talk to her.

rows.label: qst300102_msg201
rows.name:
Thanks to you, we've gathered
more than enough rations!

rows.label: qst300102_msg202
rows.name:
Yes, with this, we can assign
missions to more members.

rows.label: qst300102_msg203
rows.name:
I need to organize the
warehouse, so please report
to Yuu that we're finished.
